title: Chapter 2598: Trapped In The Deep Mountains (1)
body:
Chapter 2598: Trapped In The Deep Mountains (1)

Chapter 2598: Trapped in the Deep Mountains (1)

Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

“Meow?”

In the Apricot Realm, Greedy the Cat Spirit paused its conducting alchemy. It jumped over and lifted its owner’s finger that was soaked in the medicinal liquid.

It didn’t move at all.

It scratched the air with its front paws in confusion.

Was it just an illusion? It seemed to have moved just now?

It had already fed him so many Elixirs and even refined a batch of Holy Medicine. Its owner had slept long enough…

It was time to wake up, right?

“I’m really curious. What exactly is the ‘plan’ that the high and mighty Hallmaster Dao insisted on discussing with me?”

On Qingyuan Mountain, the Divine Puppet fell to the ground and began to chat without any intention to resist.

Zhu Yike had tried his best.

He couldn’t even escape this. Indeed, Qiongcang’s plans were better than his.

Dao Qiongcang sat on Zhu Yike’s soft and powerless chest. He did not care about the screams of the person below him and laughed.

“Chatting isn’t that direct.”

“How about this, can I ask a question first?”

“If you have something to say, just say it.” Having fallen into the hands of others, Jin Ren still felt invincible and dared to speak out.

Dao Qiongcang didn’t care much about the question of respect. He pointed at the remains of the Divine Puppet and asked. “How far have you studied this thing?”

“What you see is one in ten thousand.” Jin Ren replied.

In fact, this was all he had.

He had tried for a long time, but he was unable to refine a Divine Puppet that possessed its own consciousness like Number Two.

But it was normal.

If it was really that easy to study, wouldn’t Dao Qiongcang just be a piece of trash?

“Ha, if this is only one in ten thousand, your attainments in the Divine Secret will probably surpass mine.” Dao Qiongcang laughed.

“Are you afraid?” Jin Ren refuted casually. “If you know what’s good for you, release Old Zhu and myself.”

Even Dao Qiongcang, who was good at chatting, choked and didn’t know what to say.

In what way did I show fear?

He shook his head and laughed. He pulled out the array wheel head of the Divine Puppet with a ‘snap’ and carefully examined it.

“This thing looks pretty good.”

Buzz…

The Divine Puppet was almost destroyed.

Jin Ren’s spiritual senses were almost cut off in this sealed body. He felt very miserable and could only curse the cruelty of this Elder Dao the Flamboyant…

He could just ask, why did he have to snap off the head?

“There are many things contained in the head?” Dao Qiongcang’s eyes shone. The more he looked at the array wheel head, the more he felt that it was extraordinary.

“Of course. This thing was taken from your son. It can be said to be his lifeblood.”

“Number Two?” Dao Qiongcang was stunned.

“Are you scared?” Jin Ren smiled with difficulty. “I’ll give it to you. You’re welcome to it. Take your son’s head home!”

Dao Qiongcang thought about it.

Since Xu Xiaoshou dared to say that, he must have many replicas on him. This excuse was enough.

He stuffed the array wheel back into the head and repaired Xu Xiaoshou’s Divine Puppet. This prevented the spiritual senses from dying on the spot.

“A gentleman doesn’t snatch what others like.”

“I am very pleased that you like to study the Divine Secret.”

“As I said before, the doors of the Holy Divine Palace are always open for you. At least, that’s what I personally think.”

He really gave it back?

Jin Ren could hardly believe it.

He had studied this array wheel for some time, but he had no intention to let this Divine Puppet come out to fight.

Otherwise, its combat ability would not be so weak.

Thus, there was only one array wheel head that he had had replicated from the Divine Oracle Number Two’s database.

At that moment, Dao Qiongcang figured out something.

If he took it back, he would really have to stop all research on the Path Division’s Divine Secret and the internal information of the Holy Divine Palace.

Who would have thought that Dao Qiongcang would return it?

What was he thinking?

Was his brain damaged?

“Actually, you could have escaped long ago. Why are you still so persistent?” Dao Qiongcang shifted to a more comfortable position and sat on Zhu Yi’s soft stomach as he asked casually.

His hip bones were like two sharp knives that pierced Old Zhu’s eyes and caused blood to flow out of his chest.

Dao Qiongcang had already stuffed the little heart back.

He had issued a weapon prohibition order on Zhu Yike. Naturally, he didn’t want this person to die instantly. Otherwise, he wouldn’t have dealt with him in such a way. Instead, he would have killed him forcefully.

Jin Ren was silent.

Dao Qiongcang opened his arms and embraced the night. He smiled and said.

“There’s no one else here. The Thirty Three Heavens Star Weaving array has been fully activated, and the outside world can’t see us.”

“Even if the Holy Emperor looks down, I’ll be aware of it.”

“Therefore…”

He turned his head and said seriously. “You and I can talk freely. We can talk about the saints, romance, nature and everything else.”

However, Jin Ren’s focus was on the sentence – ‘even if the Holy Emperor looks down, I will be aware of it’… Was Elder Dao the Flamboyant really that powerful?

“You haven’t answered my question.” Dao Qiongcang asked again.

He had long seen that Xu Xiaoshou could have escaped under The Divine’s protection when he was in the Four Symbols Secret Realm.

What he was curious about was whether Xu Xiaoshou really obeyed Bazhun’an’s orders, or was this just his own idea?

“I wanted to give it try.” Jin Ren said.

“Oh? You saved Xiang Yaoyao because you wanted to give it a try, not because Bazhun’an ordered you to do so?”

“I wanted to know if the Ten High Nobles were really as invincible as the rumors say.” Jin Ren laughed, just like what Dao Qiongcang said, they could speak freely here.

“Now that you’ve tried it, how do you feel?”

“It’s alright.”

“Hahahaha, you’ve already fallen to this point, and you still say ‘It’s alright’?” Dao Qiongcang pointed at the pile of junk in front of him.

“I’ve calculated everything. You only took a wisp of my spiritual senses. That’s all.” Jin Ren laughed. “If I use all my strength, I can kill you with a flip of my palm like killing a mosquito.”
